about_the_game:
"Virtua Unlimited Project" Original Art Gallery
This artbook contains illustrations, concept art, and early sketch about the game's characters, backgrounds, items, equipment, enemies, etc.

Included is an art collection of 58 pages

-Exclusive Cover : 2 pages
-Character Concept : 12 pages
-Artistic Illustrations: 10 pages, 20 images
-Character Avatars: 4 pages, 24 sets
-Design Sketches: 22 pages
-Item: 1 pages

Virtua Unlimited Project is a 2D pixel-art style ACT game featuring VTuber characters. With classical platformer gameplay, challenging combat, and retro game feelings, VUP presents you a surreal, virtual world in which you will play as Aizawa Kana to venture and seek the truth beneath.

[Where to find the DLC: Go to your Library in the Steam client. Right click the game and select Properties. Then select DLC. From the DLC installation and management menu you can see if you have "Virtua Unlimited Project - Digital Artbook and whether if it's been installed.]
